features: Premium Quality: Linen Textured Semi-sheer Window Panels
NATURAL SEMI SHEER CURTAINS: Sold in pair, 52" w x 84" /panel, 104" w x 84" /pair, Natural linen curtains. Recommend ordering 2 to 3 times rod width for proper look and fullness

LINEN TEXTURED SHEER CURTAINS: Solid linen semi sheer curtains (100% poly) will certainly brighten up and upgrade your home décor at no cost, perfect for living room, bedroom, family room, dining room, kitchen, farmhouse, studio, Kids Room.

DRAPE IN SHAPE: These thick and heavy-duty semi-sheer curtains give the panel a nice drop and a luxurious textured Look. Besides, our curtain is ecofriendly and safe to people with the new print technology.

GROMMET TOP CURTAINS: 8 silver grey grommets fit any standard or decorative curtain rods up to 1.5" in diameter. Easy and convenient to hang. These printing window curtains are perfect for living room, bedroom, kitchen, porch, even outdoor place

EASY MAINTENANCE: The curtains offer great durability. Machine washable in cold water. Tumble dry low. Quick iron or steam clean at low temperature settings. Feel free to contact us for any product problem, we will certainly respond within 12 hours. Custom sizes are available, please feel free to contact us
body.description: Bring texture and classic style to your window, let subtle filtered light into your room for an uplifting ambiance. Offering a quality semi sheer linen curtains with rich linen-textured look that will go well with any home decor. LINEN TEXTURED LOOK Cross weave textured adds dimension and style to any room of your home The airy weave textured semi-sheer fabric gently filters light while enhancing privacy Much thicker than ordinary sheer curtains, Linen textured curtains look modern and expensive. These natural taupe semi sheer curtains are perfect for Living room, bedroom, kids room, yard, patio, parlor, sliding door PERFORMANCE: Neutral linen curtains work well with many different styles. Dress it up with other Fmfunctex curtains on a double rod, or keep it casual as a standalone sheer. Grommets top semi sheer window curtains for easy hanging, opening and closing. Silver metal grommet top design fits curtain rods up to 1 ½" in diameter PACKAGE DETAIL: Color: White, Grey, Natural Linen, Navy Blue, Blush pink Width: 52” each panel, comes in 2 Panels Provides additional coverage and fullness Available lengths: 63inch, 72inch, 84inch, 96inch, 108inch CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Crafted from 100% Polyester Wash separately Machine washable Tumble dry on Low TIPS: It is recommended to order 2 to 3 times rod width for proper look and fullness Measure carefully before selecting your desired size and quantity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these drapes, will be buying more
reviews.reviewText: I searched online and in stores looking for the right style, color and weight of drapes to change the dynamic of my living room. After comparing many different brands and reviews, I decided to take a chance on these. I'm so glad that I made this choice. It can be difficult when purchasing drapes online, because you can't gauge the real color or weight of the fabric, but I was so pleased that the color is spot on. Additionally, the weight is perfect! I'd call them mid-heavyweight, definitely not lightweight or cheap. They provide just enough sheerness to allow the light to come in, but they don't block out the light.The grommets are not cheap looking. No chips or sharp edges (as can happen with some grommets), and they appear to be well made.I'll definitely be purchasing more to dress up my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality light and soft perfect sheer
reviews.reviewText: I took pictures at different times of the day. And with no light and light on. Buy these! They’re beautiful I’ve been in love. My accent wall is plum taupe by Behr. Room still in progress but they’re worth it.Update: I work selling window treatments and I tested out two panels. I just got around ordering two more to give fullness. I kept trying to see if I wanted another set of sheers or do opaque panels on the sides but I chose to add sheers. On the markets custom styles can really add up so I’m glad I got these for a fraction of the cost. Love them! I’ve added two new photos to compare two panels vs 4 panels on a window over 72 inches wide. Now the height is shorter than I’d like but the 96 inch was too long for my style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my space!
reviews.reviewText: So glad I bought these curtains!! They are the perfect addition to my home creating privacy, but also such a beautiful addition. They are a great balance of sheer while also providing the privacy you want without adding in another curtain set behind. They allow light in during the day, but also enough coverage at night. They didn't come wrinkled and haven't wrinkled, so that has been GREAT. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They do the job!
reviews.reviewText: These have absolutely no room darkening effect lol, so just beware if that is your goal. These match perfectly in my guest room. Quality is decent, although I’m not the biggest fan of the large metal circles to hang the curtains on the rod. For the price, they’re worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect semi-sheer linen look
reviews.reviewText: I was delighted to see these were a quality linen look material and truly semi-sheer as described. Two, 50” valances spanned our 66” window with just enough fold for a loose pleated look. The color is true white which offered the casual, beachy look we were after (over top of an existing white fabric shade). We plan to hang them on a brushed nickel rod a few inches above window frame (which the 18” length allows for). Seams are consistent, wrinkles are minimal and they are well made. Very pleased with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are the best I've ever owned. The fabric is gorgeous, the quality is excellent and the color is as advertised. Great price too. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look great and stay nice after washing
reviews.reviewText: I put these curtains in my office and they do a great job of letting lots of light in but still maintaining privacy. They were a little wrinkled at first but that resolved within a day or so after hanging them. I've also put these through a wash cycle and they still look great and kept their shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST curtains.
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are exactly what I was looking for? Something light and airy but also quality and classy. They are semi sheer, slight texture. Think “light weight linen” and you will be spot on. They are extremely classy and the grommets are high quality. They come with 2 panels. My windows are huge so I used 2 pair for each window.Can’t say enough about these curtains. ☺️☺️

The media could not be loaded. Ordered the natural linen to see if it would match up with my paint as I didn't want any warm tones. It is perfect! Needed 6 panels to do this whole window. Slightly sheer, but that's what I wanted. If you pulled them straight, it would be more sheer, but pleated this way is perfect! Texture and quality is perfect! Theyre nice and heavy and hang well! We can see out but no one can see in. It does have grommets, but I used toilet paper rolls as spacers and it looks amazing 👏 🤩 Exactly what I wanted! Would order this product again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Natural, stunning look, great quality. Have them all over my flat.
Like these curtains were the right length got a good price! Nice fabric let the light in but still gives a decent privacy
I bought these curtains in white.......stunning.....great material.....great look!!
They look great and no wrinkles and sheer enough to let in some light.
